articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: U.S. pediatricians' new COVID-19 shot recommendations differ from CDC advice - NBC News
articles.description: For the first time in 30 years, the American Academy of Pediatrics is substantially diverging from U.S. government vaccine recommendations
articles.content:
For the first time in 30 years, the American Academy of Pediatrics is substantially diverging from U.S. government vaccine recommendations.
